name: my melody yt logo [FIXED]
description:
changes youtube logo into my melody! had to change it from the previous gif due to losing the img.

some my melody cursors:
https://custom-cursor.com/en/collection/sanrio/my-melody-harp

or

customize one here!
https://custom-cursor.com/en/constructor

to use them, add custom cursors chrome extension!
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/custom-cursor-for-chrome/ogdlpmhglpejoiomcodnpjnfgcpmgale?hl=nl

it works on other sites too, but not outside of chrome!!
